title: It's new, it's neat, it's obsolete
creator_credit: Alec Lorimore, Jim Foster and Bailey Film Productions
brief_description: ‘Honest’ Louie Ballou, used-car dealer, explains to us ‘confidentially’ how fashion and gimmickry create obsolescence and how we can use commonsense to get the most for our money. This film is a vivid springboard for discussion of the concepts of fashion, gimmickry obsolescence, and value for the consumer.
